author: neilg
msg: after the change to DefaultEntityHandler, make sure TraverseSchema still emits warnings when included or imported schemas cannot be located.

author: neilg
msg: throw an IOException when a file cannot be located instead of a SAXException.  This mirrors the behaviour of Xerces2 and complies with what JAXP expects a parser to do.
